answerText: haibun [prompt on "haikai"] [10] The Narrow Road to the Deep North is by this Edo period Japanese poet, known for his haikus.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | MIT A + LASA B | 13 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Robert D. Wilson has published a series of works in this form titled Vietnam Ruminations. For 10 points each: [10] Name this form that combines a prose poem and a haiku. This poetic form was popularized by The  Narrow Road to the Deep North.
